ðŸ“Š Overview
Track counts and tallies directly in your browser. Whether you need to keep track of scores, inventory, habits, etc., Tally makes it simple and efficient.

ðŸŒŸ Features
- Add Tally Items: Easily add new tally items to your list.
- Increment/Decrement Buttons: Simple + and - buttons for quick adjustments.
- Dark Mode: Toggle between light and dark modes to suit your preference.
- Reorder Tally Items: Drag and drop to rearrange your tally items.
- Export/Import Tallies: Export your tallies to a CSV file or import from an existing CSV.
- Reset & Clear: Quickly reset all tally numbers or clear individual tallies.
- Persistent Storage: Your tally data is saved in Chrome storage and stays intact across sessions.
- Responsive Design: Clean, modern UI that looks great on any screen size.
- Track Unlimited Tallies: Keep track of as many tallies and tally counts as you need.
- Side Panel Access: Quickly access your tallies by right-clicking the Tally icon and selecting "Open side panel" to keep your tally list visible and accessible at all times.

ðŸ“‹ How to Use
- Add a New Tally Item: Click the "Add Tally" button to create a new tally item.
- Customize the Tally: Enter a label for your tally and adjust the count using the + and - buttons.
- Reorder Tallies: Drag and drop tally items to reorder them as needed.
- Export/Import: Use the Export button to save your tallies as a CSV file. Import tallies from a CSV file by selecting the Import option.
- Reset/Clear: Reset all tallies to zero or clear individual tally counts using the provided buttons.
- Access the Side Panel: To keep your tallies always visible, right-click the Tally icon in the Chrome toolbar and select "Open side panel." The side panel will display your tally list and can be accessed alongside your other browser tasks.

- Board Games: Keep track of scores and game points.

- Event Planning: Count attendees, supplies, and more.
- Exercise & Fitness: Track sets, reps, and workout progress.
